alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 8:47PM EST until March 13 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton. .Runoff from recent heavy rain is forecast to send the Patoka at Princeton above flood stage tomorrow. Moderate flooding is forecast when the river crests next week. For the Patoka River...including Princeton...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY, MARCH 13... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...Until Monday, March 13. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Flooding affects mainly farmland. Seasonal camping trailers closest to the river become inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Friday the stage was 16.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 20.5 feet Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday, March 12. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
